# Budget App - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is an Electron-based desktop budgeting application that runs a local Express server and uses React for the UI. The app runs entirely offline on the user's laptop and includes auto-update functionality.

## Tech Stack
- **Desktop Framework**: Electron
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express
- **Frontend**: React
- **Auto-Updates**: electron-updater
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Development Guidelines
- Keep the app fully functional offline
- Maintain separation between main process (Electron), backend (Express), and frontend (React)
- Follow security best practices for Electron apps
- Ensure all data is stored locally
